title: Merry Christmas!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Fufufu~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮 Kanata-san, I’m done arranging the food!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Woah~! Hanayo-chan, great job! This is better than what I would have done! I’m glad I left it up to you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe......! What do you think about the way I set Lanzhu-san and Mia-chan’s chicken and turkey?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Very good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>What about the cake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Looks good too. Tada, the jelly topped with fruit is done~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wow! It looks like a wreath! It’s pretty~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>We’re all set for the feast.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Setsuna-san just sent a message saying that she and the others are done with the decorations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright, let’s deliver the feast~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
